member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the client executable, usualy something like "C:\Program Files\EA Games\Ultima Online Mondain's Legacy\". This is also the working directory for the clients launched using UOAI.
member.returns: The path to the client executable.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientExe
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the client executable, normally "client.exe"
member.returns: The name of the client executable.

member.name: T:UOAI2.UOAI.IPCConstants
member.summary: IPCConstants = windows messages send to the injected dll to perform synchronized actions

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onClientExit
member.summary: Called when the client process closes.
member.param: The client that exited, for multi-clienting event handlers in VB.NET

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onPacketReceive
member.summary: Called when a Packet arrives on this client.
member.param: Client on which the packet was received

members.member:
Called when the user of the client releases a pressed key.
The client on which the key was released ''' Virtual Key Code of the released key (a list of key codes can be founrd at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx)

Called when the user of the client holds down a key.
The client on which the key was pressed ''' Virtual Key Code of the pressed key (a list of key codes can be founrd at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx)

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onConnectionLoss
member.summary: Called when the client loses its network connection to the server.
member.param: The client that lost its connection.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.PatchEncryption
member.summary: Disables the client encryption.
member.remarks: For free servers, you should patch encryption. Encryption is required on OSI servers.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.UpdatePacket(UOAI2.UOAI.Packet@)
member.summary: Used from within the onRecievePacket/onPacketSend events to commit the changes to the packet and pass it on.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.DropPacket
member.summary: Used from within the onRecievePacket/onPacketSend events to tell UOAI to delete the packet so the client never gets it.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.RemoveObject(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Remove an item, mobile, etc... from the collections
member.param: The 32-bit address in the client's memory of the object as

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.PID
member.summary: Gets the windows process ID of the client. This is used as the unique identifier for each client running.
member.value: The windows Process ID of the client.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.CallEvent_onClientExit
member.summary: Causes the UOClient object to raise the onClientExit event.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.Close
member.summary: Kills the client process, which subsequently calls the "onClientExit" event for this client instance.

summary.para: A method used to get the title of the client window as a string.

member.returns: The client window title, generally something like "Ultima Online"

member.summary: Gets or Sets the speech type as .

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.AllAccess
member.summary: Specifies all possible access flags for the process object.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.CreateThread
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the CreateRemoteThread function to create a thread in the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.DuplicateHandle
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle as either the source or target process in the DuplicateHandle function to duplicate a handle.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.QueryInformation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the GetExitCodeProcess and GetPriorityClass functions to read information from the process object.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.SetInformation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the SetPriorityClass function to set the priority class of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.Terminate
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the TerminateProcess function to terminate the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMOperation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the VirtualProtectEx and WriteProcessMemory functions to modify the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMRead
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the ReadProcessMemory function to' read from the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMWrite
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the WriteProcessMemory function to write to the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.Synchronize
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in any of the wait functions to wait for the process to terminate.

member.name: T:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports
member.summary: A class to encapsulate imported functions from User32.dll and Kernel32.dll

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.InitializeClientPaths
member.summary: Gets the working directory and location of client.exe from the registry.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.LaunchClient
member.summary: Launches a new Client, returns true if successfull, false if not.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.byPID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Find a UOAI.Client object by its associated Process ID.
member.param: The windows Process ID of the client you want to find.
member.returns: Returns a UOAI.Client, if it finds the correct one it returns that one. Although if it doesn't find one matching the PID it will raise the "onError" event and return the first client in the list.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Add(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds clients to the Clients arraylist, based on PID
member.param: The process ID of the client you want to add.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removed a client from the clients arraylist, based on PID.
member.param: The process ID of the client you want to remove.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Count
member.summary: Forces update of client list then returns a count of the clients.
member.returns: An integer value representing the current number of UO clients running.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Client
member.summary: Returns the UOAI.Client at the specified index.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.ForceUpdateClientList
member.summary: Forces the clientlist to update, called when UOAI.UOClientList.Count is called and on startup.

member.summary: Handles the "Process.Exited" for client processes.
member.param: The System.Diagnostics.Process that is being handled.
